headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. For this endpoint, use application/json .

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. You can find the App ID by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer application. You can find the Secret by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The subscription ID. You can get the IDs of subscriptions under an app via subscription_id returned by /subscription/get/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The unique ID of the request.
